page.title: 06LANDSCAPE AND SETTLEMENTS
page.content: SOUTH & SOUTH EAST,THE LAND FALLS 29M. IN 4 KM.TOWARDS THE SOUTH EAST THE LAND UNDULATES SLIGHTLY,AND THERE ARE ALSO VALLEYS WITH STREAMS IN THEM. {SETTLEMENTS}MOST OF THE SETTLEMENTS AROUND BOYLESTONE ARE SINGLE FARMS, FOR EXAMPLE HAREHILL FARM,OR SINGLE LARGE HOUSES.THESE ARE DISPERSED THROUGHOUT THE LOCATION.THE VILLAGE OF BOYLESTONE ITSELF IS THE MAJOR SETTLEMENT OF THE DISTRICT.THIS IS NUCLEATED ALTHOUGH THE POST OFFICE AND PUBLIC HOUSE ARE SEPARATED FROM THE REST OF THE VILLAGE,BEING SITUATED TO THE SOUTH WEST AND LINKED TO THE VILLAGE BY A MINOR ROAD.THERE IS A LINEAR DISTRIBUTION TOWARDS MACKELEY HOUSE.OVERALL WE CAN SAY THAT THE DISTRIBUTION OF SETTLEMENT IS FAIRLY REGULAR,ALTHOUGH THERE IS NO SETTLEMENT AROUND THE STREAMS IN THE SOUTH EAST.TOWARDS THE SOUTH WEST
